title: Victor’s Wreath

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, crown a player, making their vote count as 3 for the following day. They will not be notified of this until they make a vote.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot crown the same player more than once.
- The amount needed to hang a player does not change.
- You may target yourself.

desc:
Post 2163
*A laurel crown, representing triumph. We will win, won't we?*
